description:
Marcus has gone mad. He killed all the scientists, and is holding Chief Gooley prisoner. This job`s too big even for the Dirty Pair!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ho, Honki!? Bijo ni Cannon-hou wa Dasshutsu no Keyword
R-Really!? For Beautiful Women, "Canon" Is the Keyword to Escape
ホ, 本気!?美女にキャノン砲は脱出のキーワード
